description: Repository to host pre-commit image that can be used for CI/CD processes. Source of the image is available https://github.com/gyalai-aws/docker-images-for-ci
aboutText: This repository is used as part of the CI/CD process for our project in Gitlab to provide baseimage for executing pre-commit steps.
usageText: This repository is free to use for anyone who thinks it is useful. Enjoy.
